name: Charlotte Bamford
title: Web Developer
professionalSummary: I’m a lifelong computer nerd with a passion for clean, tested code and streamlined automation. I have a broad range of experience with both frontend and backend javascript and typescript systems, but my heart belongs to API-driven React apps.

accomplishments: I created the file tree structure for an internal code development tool built on an event sourced backend. Over the course of the project, I converted the system to use GraphQl to preserve the tree’s data structure and allow the file tree on the client’s side to be lazy loaded, ultimately resulting in a vast performance increase over the previous solution for both the server and the client.

I developed several sites for a major video game developer using automated server side rendering and caching to eliminate as much latency as possible for their consumers. Additionally, I reimplemented several overbuilt components of the site to improve both performance and reusability.

I migrated sites built on EOL platforms to modern and maintainable platforms, while preserving and enhancing their original functionality. I also implemented new responsive and accessible themes according to the client’s provided specifications.

I led the development of a specialized ERP platform built on a custom stack including Dgraph, NodeJs, Express, graphQl, and React. During the course of the project, I architected the data security systems that the project was started to implement.
I led production on a packaging line, following procedures and guidelines to ensure quality in the end project while also maintaining an excellent pace.
I provided logistical support to the entire floor to minimize downtime for any station.
I designed tools to streamline the end of day reporting workflow, improving my efficiency and reducing errors.
I maintained the property overnight, handling guest issues, closed the business day, preparing facilities for the next day, and tidying the property.
I maintained the property overnight, handling guest issues, closed the business day, preparing facilities for the next day, and tidying the property.
I redesigned several product workflows to improve efficency.
